summary: Hotel booking app with admin, hotel, and guest accounts; add review/rating and align booking management features across roles without breaking existing functionality.
architectural_notes: App has role-based accounts: admin, hotel, guest; booking features and permissions differ by role.
known_issues: User reports app was published/deployed without implementing the requested revisions (review/rating + booking updates).

existing_features.title: Add a persistent Review/Rating feature where both Guest accounts and Hotel accounts can create a review with a 1â€“5 star rating and optional text, and list existing reviews.
Update the Hotel Account bookings section so its booking list layout/model matches the Admin bookings panel layout model (scrollable list, consistent card structure, and key booking metadata).
Add booking actions requested by role: Hotel Account must have Cancel and Delete actions; Guest Account must have Cancel action only.

Ensure the requested changes are implemented and verifiable before any publish/deploy guidance is shown as 'ready', and add clear UI messaging that publishing should not occur until the requested revisions are complete.

Fix/handle invalid published URL situations by improving user-facing guidance when the app URL does not resolve to a canister (e.g., gateway 'Canister ID Not Resolved'), including troubleshooting steps to reach the correct live URL.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add review & rating feature so both guests and hotels can submit reviews/ratings (available in guest and hotel accounts).
Make booking list/management UI in hotel account match the model/features of booking management in admin account (per admin screenshot example).
Add booking actions: in hotel account add Cancel and Delete booking buttons; in guest account add Cancel booking button only.
Ensure requested changes are implemented before publishing/deploying; do not disturb other existing features that are working normally.
